item.title: Report X-2023080114
item.description:
Report X-2023080114

  • City: SAINT PETERSBURG

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: During the shipment 1 cap on 1 bottle came loose and liquid spilled in box. Unload discovered wet box and contained the leak by putting it in a Hazmat container for processing. DescribePack: 1 cap on 1 bottle came loose and liquid spilled in box. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Unload discovered wet box and contained the leak by putting it in a Hazmat container for processing.

item.title: Report X-2023080098

  • City: OCALA

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found 2 bottles of Paramount super concentrated machine dishwash 1-gallon had loose lids resulted to leakage. The plastic plug caps & seals beneath lids were wet & loose allowing leakage. DescribePack: Bottles had loose lids along with the plastic plug caps & seals beneath lids were wet & loose resulted to leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023080088
item.description:
Report X-2023080088

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-26
  • City: DEFUNIAK SPRINGS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. brought back by driver after noticing the pkg. was wet. Pkg. taken to QA cage for further inspection. DescribePack: Upon inspection, it was noted that 1 of the 4 gallon containers had a loose cap, causing liquid to leak out. No partitions inside, just a cardboard top, no plastic bags. Orientation arrows on side of box. DurationRel: 5 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. placed in the HWPA awaiting instructions from PGH.

item.title: Report X-2023080070
item.description:
Report X-2023080070

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-25
  • City: TAMPA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The pail arrived to the station leaking out from a dented/compromised lid. Upon discovery it was brought over to QA to be fully processed and contained. DescribePack: There is a noticeable dent that goes from the top of the pail all the way to bottom as it appears that the pail was either dropped or was collided with. The dent deformed the area around the lid, allowing the contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: There was no release found as the leakage seems to have dried up around the closure and along the pail

RESPONDER TOOK PACKAGE TO DMP ARE VIA HAZMAT PUSH CART AND DMPED ALL 4 GALLONS USING SODIUM BICARBONATE, WHILE WEARING PROPER PPE.

  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED THROUGH RADIO OF A LEAKING PACKAGE, RESPONDER DONNED PPE AND RETRIEVED SPILL CART. FOLLOWING THE DECISION TREE RESPONDER DETERMINED THAT CONTAINMENT SHEET FOR 1.4 EXPLOSIVES WAS TO BE USED. AREA WHERE THE PACKAGE IS LOCATED WAS CORDONNED OFF AND CHAIN OF COMMAND WAS NOTIFIED. OUTSIDE RESPONDER WAS CALLED TO CLEAN UP PACKAGE.

DescribePack: The glass bottle of Titration (TNA) Solvent is shattered and completely emptied out and dried out. No padding or inner packing materials were used. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Upon arrival the wet package was placed in a hazmat bag and bin for further containment. No release was found.

item.title: Report X-2023071166
item.description:
Report X-2023071166

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-16
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found 1 bottle of Trueline Black Max coil cleaner 1-gallon was crushed & had loose lid resulted to leakage & stained all contents inside. DescribePack: Bottle was crushed & had loose lid resulted to internal leakage & stained all contents inside. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

item.title: Report X-2023071155
item.description:
Report X-2023071155

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-17
  • City: FORT MYERS
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer and placed on the rollers. Package handler did not notify management hazmat had internal leak. ( Package handler may have been un aware.) Package was moved from 1 set of rollers to a second set. I was told package had spilled out onto a Package handlers shirt and his stomach is now irritated. SCMS was entered on package handler and hazmat was taken to hazmat area where was placed into a hazmat bag and spill bin. DescribePack: Hazmat states it has venting caps on product and that product is placed inside a small bag and then packaged into box with packing material ( Fiberboard Liners) package must have been loaded sideways at some point in transit because the leaking from the vent cap. Eventually pressure caused plastic bag to burst and material to leak out of plastic bag and cause internal leak and then eventually leaking onto package handlers shirt. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: Once discovered package was taken to hazmat cage and placed into hazmat bag and spill bin.

item.title: Report X-2023071153
item.description:
Report X-2023071153

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-17
  • City: ORLANDO
  • State: FL

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023071153 SequenceEvent: The box was put into overhead sortation and was found wet in the load area, and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: The cap came loose on one of the jugs in the box, causing contents to leak out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote. 2. X-2023071154 SequenceEvent: The 5-gallon jerrican was found leaking in the unload and moved to the hazmat cage for reports. DescribePack: Contents were leaking from under the cap on jerrican, even though the cap was on tight. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The jerrican was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote.

The cap was on tight, and there was a seal on the spout of the jug. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The box was placed upright into a hazbag lined tote

item.title: Report X-2023071074
item.description:
Report X-2023071074

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-15T18:13:48+00:00

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: 1.X-2023071074 SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found a box containing 2 bottles of Rapicide PA part A 5-liter had loose lids which resulted to leakage & stained contents. Due to leakage, the 2 bottles of Rapicide PA part B 5-liter have stained marks. DescribePack: Bottles had loose lid resulted to leakage & stained contents. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote. 2. X-2023071083 SequenceEvent: Package was found wet & torn. Upon inspection found a box containing 2 bottles of Rapicide PA part A 5-liters were crushed & had loose lids resulted to leakage. DescribePack: Bottles were crushed & had loose lids resulted to leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Placed in hazmat bag lined tote.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: The hazmat was unloaded off the truck where it was found to be leaking from the inside DescribePack: the cap was loose on the bottles DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Quickly brought the box to a hazmat bin and placed it in hazmat cage and cleaned up where it had leaked

item.title: Report X-2023070283
item.description:
Report X-2023070283

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-18T21:11:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-17
  • City: OCALA
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: FEDERAL EXPRESS CORPORATION
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Package was found and offered to the dangerous goods specialist at our Ocala Fl station location during morning sort. Package was a plastic pak and employee could hear what they describe as a metal ball rattling. They believed the package could contain an aerosol can inside. Package was opened for inspection and a spray can of Alu-Mend was found inside. Label on can claimed contents to be flammable and under pressure. There were no DG marks nor labels to indicate package contained an aerosol. Package has been held at station location pending FAA investigation.

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Driver stated he is hands off loading at Symrise. Operators were inside a building while the trailer was being loaded and the clock in that office was off. About 30 gallons was spilled. This all happened in a containment area. Nothing is needed from GTI. Symrise will pump out some product to ensure weight compliance. Trailer will be washed at tank wash after leaving Symrise.

item.title: Report X-2023080117
item.description:
Report X-2023080117

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-19T00:29:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-04-25
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: 1. X-2023080117 SequenceEvent: Package was discovered to be leaking during the unload process. Package was immediately placed in a bag and tote and brought to the hazmat cage to be processed. DescribePack: Loose caps DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was instantly placed in a tote to mitigate the spill. 2. X-2023080485 SequenceEvent: It appears that the package was dropped by a package handler during the unload process resulting in the bottles inside of the box being cracked at the side. DescribePack: Bottles inside of package were cracked open at the sides resulting in the liquid leaking out of the package. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Items were placed in a hazmat bag and then placed inside of a hazmat drum while waiting to be processed.

item.title: Report X-2023080100
item.description:
Report X-2023080100

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-19T00:29:19+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-03-04
  • City: JACKSONVILLE
  • State: FL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was discovered to be leaking during the unload process. package was placed in a tote and brought to the hazmat cage where it was discovered to be caused from loose caps on the contents in the package. DescribePack: Loose caps. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was immediately placed in a tote and brought to the hazmat area to be contained.
